title: Understanding the Role of Legal Teams
text: While legal teams are crucial in ensuring compliance with laws and regulations, they may not have the technical expertise to fully understand the nuances of data classification.

title: Involvement of Other Departments
text: Consider the importance of involving IT, data management, and business units in the classification process to ensure a comprehensive approach.

title: Collaboration Across Teams
text: Why is it important to involve multiple departments in the classification process?
